questions.description: You’re really busy at work and a colleague is telling you their life story and personal woes. You:

options.description: Think it’s more important to give them some of your time; work can wait
Listen, but only with half an ear
Interrupt and explain that you are really busy at the moment

questions.description: You’re having an animated discussion with a colleague regarding a project that you’re in charge of. You:

options.description: Think that they are obviously right
Defend your own point of view, tooth and nail

questions.description: You are taking part in a guided tour of a museum. You:

options.description: Are a bit too far towards the back so don’t really hear what the guide is saying
Make sure that everyone is able to hear properly
Are right up the front, adding your own comments in a loud voice
